text: 2:9 Onger Akaba 34:17-19; 1 Korin 10:13; Jut 1:6Ekiam amizir biziba, e dagh nɨghnɨgha kamaghɨn fo, osɨmtɨzitam gumazamizir Godɨn Arazibar gɨn zui taba batogham, God osɨmtɨzir kam uam me da a iniamin tuavim gɨfo. Ezɨ God arazir kurabagh amir gumazamizibagh fo, egha men arazir kuraba ikarvaghamin tuavim gɨfo, mamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨva Godɨn Kotɨn Ekiamɨn Dughiam otogham.
